assignments.description: Show Date of Customer Confirmation error
assignments.name: Date_of_Customer_Confirmation
assignments.label: Date of Customer Confirmation

value.stringValue: The Date of Customer Confirmation has been set to a future date. The Date of Customer Confirmation cannot be set to a future date, select the date based on the customer confirmation received.

assignments.name: Date_of_Customer_Confirmation_Mode_of_Confirmation_required
assignments.label: Date of Customer Confirmation & Mode of Confirmation required

value.stringValue: Date of Customer Confirmation & Mode of Confirmation are required fields

"Reason Recall Postponed / Declined - Other" is blank but is a required field when "Reason Recall Activity Postponed" OR "Reason Recall Activity Declined" is set to "Other". Add other reason in the "Reason Recall Postponed / Declined - Other" field.
Reason Recall Activity Declined is blank but a required field when Recall Activity is set to Recall Actions Declined. Add a reason to the Reason Recall Activity Declined field.
Reason Recall Activity Postponed is blank but a required field when Recall Activity is set to Recall Actions Postponed. Add a reason to the Reason Recall Activity Postponed field.
The "Product Return Status - Other" field is required when "Other" was selected in the "Product Return Status" field. Fill in a reason in the "Product Return Status -Other" field.

assignments.name: Returned_through_another_Work_Order_Required
assignments.label: Returned through another Work Order Required

value.stringValue: The "Product Returned Through Work Order" field is required when "Returned through another Work Order" is selected in the "Product Return Status" field. Enter a work order number in the "Product Returned Through Work Order" field.
